name: For Goblor!
description:
Instructions:
Click on the goblin to select it !
Use Right Mouse Button to move your goblin.
Get stronger by eating mushrooms.
Avenge your fallen ancestors who were made fun of by those so called "heroes" !

This was game made during GameDevTV GameJam 2022.

Credits:
Everything by Martti Kandelin, except.. !

Art:
Background & characters - kenney.nl
Font: Press Start 2P - CodeMan38

Audio from freesound.org:
male pain sound effects.wav
Goblins Party.wav
carrotnom.wav
Evil Laugh 9.wav
